title: City H888
description: Book Two of the Windor series – Novelette 14500 wordsAllie, her watcher Lucas, and hunter Jacob are Windor’s only chance in the plot to defeat King Barden III. Courageously, but fearing the worst, they choose to accept the mission of traveling to a new World in hopes of finding other Windor people and Allie’s long lost twin brother. Upon arrival, they see the devastation and realize the likelihood of finding them is small as they search for a population ceasing to exist. Twist and turns will take you by surprise throughout this voyage of revelation, leaving you unable to put the book down.-Out Of Print-
author: J Husted
